review.description: not a great pizza.... definitely can find better ones . Enjoyed the wings and Belgian Beers but not a big fan of the brooklyn beer. nice place overall and although there is no one greeting you when you walk in the staff are really friendly.
review.author: Pak A.

review.description: Great addition to downtown.  The food has a flare not usually seen in a brewhouse.  Love the lobster claw sliders.  I'll be back for Drinks & Eats.  Good vibe.
review.author: James M.

review.description: If you're looking for a great place to eat or just have drinks, the Brooklyn Brewhouse  is the place to go.  They have a great happy hour and are willing to  change around anything on the menu to make what you are craving.  Try this once and you'll definitely go back again and again.  The staff is awesome also, especially Keith.
review.author: Susan T.
